scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run main:dev" "npm run biz:dev" "npm run news:dev"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:main && npm run build:biz && npm run build:news && npm run merge-outputs
scripts.build:main: cd src/sites/main-natalie && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:biz: cd src/sites/biz-natalie && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:news: cd src/sites/news-natalie && npm install && npm run build
scripts.merge-outputs: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/sites/main-natalie/out/* dist/ && cp -r src/sites/biz-natalie/out dist/biz && cp -r src/sites/news-natalie/out dist/news
